name: Tribs.io
description:
Join the tribs.io community, choose your tribe, customize your hero, select your powers and defeat the other players in an epic fight! 

In this innovative .io game, your goal is to defeat all the other players and lead your tribe to the victory!

A century ago, the AGATAMA village’s sacred diamond mysteriously disappeared. The three tribes of this world accused one another of the precious diamond theft! Then the war broke out. 

During this centenarian conflict, you will have to choose your tribe: AGWA, FAYA or PLONT. Will you become the hero who will find the sacred diamond and bring victory to his tribe ?

To become your tribe’s eagerly awaited hero, you must defeat all the other players and lead your tribe to the victory !

In order to reach this goal, you can use dozens of powers and customize your hero with hundreds of different skins! 

Are you ready to fight against the other tribes and your friends in this multiplayer online .io game?

AMAZING POWERS
In this epic fight, unlock many powers that will allow you to attack or defend against the other tribes.
Unlock and equip:
The Mega Bomba: Destroy all the opponents surrounding you
The shield: Spread a shield to protect yourself
The Glue: stick your opponents to flee peacefully
The mine: drop explosive traps to defeat your opponents
And many others !

CUSTOMIZE YOUR HERO:
Unlock hundreds of skins in incredible chests to make your hero unique and taunt your friends. Each equipment allows you to improve the characteristics of your hero and become stronger and beautiful.

You dream of being a unicorn a dragon or fighting on a wooden horse? On tribs.io all your dreams can become true.

KEY FUNCTIONS
Massively Multiplayer Online Game (MMO)
Real Time Game
Join a tribe and lead it to the victory
Cute and endearing characters
Discover dozens of powers
Customize your character with more than 100 different skins
Unlock and win cool chests
Free multiplayer online game .io
A purely addictive game to play with friends 

THE TRIBS .IO COMMUNITY
Do not miss anything about the latest news from Tribs.io
Like Tribs.io on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tribs.io/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tribsio

YOUR FEEDBACKS MATTER TO US
We are listening to your feedbacks to constantly improve Tribs.io
Your feedbacks and messages are very important to us so do not hesitate to get in touch with us :)

MADJOH
Discover Tribs.io, the new game by the MadJoh studio
Learn more about MadJoh: http://www.madjoh.com
Follow us: https://www.facebook.com/MadJoh.games
